title: Graduate Art Flashcards
description: Set of flashcards for graduate level art questions

questions.question: Who is considered the father of modern art criticism?
Which artist is known for their 'cut-out' technique?
Who painted 'Guernica' depicting the horrors of the Spanish Civil War?
What art movement was founded by Andre Breton?
Which artist is famous for her large-scale installation art?
Who is known for creating the 'Campbell's Soup Cans' series?
Which artist is associated with the 'Blue Period' and 'Rose Period'?
